thread.title: BRIEF-UK's FRC Says It Has Powers To Investigate Circumstances Relating To Audit Of Carillion

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-UK's FRC Says It Has Powers To Investigate Circumstances Relating To Audit Of Carillion
text:
Jan 15 (Reuters) - Carillion Plc:
* UK‘S FRC- HAVE BEEN ACTIVELY MONITORING THIS SITUATION FOR SOME TIME IN CLOSE CONSULTATION WITH OTHER RELEVANT REGULATORY BODIES
* UK‘S FRC - HAVE POWERS TO INVESTIGATE CIRCUMSTANCES RELATING TO AUDIT OF CARILLION AS WELL AS ACTIONS OF RELEVANT ACCOUNTING PROFESSIONALS​
* UK‘S FRC - ‍OBLIGED TO FOLLOW DUE PROCESS AND WILL MAKE A FURTHER STATEMENT ON THIS MATTER SHORTLY​ Further company coverage:
